Description: The goal of this problem is to sum two given numbers and display the sum as the result
Specification:
You will have to read from the input file - "input.txt". 
					  This file contains a single line with two space separated integers. 
 
					  The sum of these two numbers should be written tas a single line to the output file - "output.txt" 

					  Look at the below samples for a better understanding of the input and output formats
